author: @katiegarrity
title: Disney World Guest Has A Message For Park Goers: "Parent Your Kids!" - Scary Mommy
text:
This Disney World Guest Has A Message For Park Goers: "Parent Your Kids!"
She posted on TikTok after a super tense moment with a fellow mom.
If Disney is supposed to be the ‚Äú
happiest place on earth,‚Äù why are children always melting down in a way that is so over the top from a tantrum that would happen at home? There is something about the Disney experience that is so pressure-filled, right? Parents are shelling out a hefty sum, so they want to make the experience as magical and wonderful as possible. This can lead to exhaustion, for parents and kids both.
Beyond the princess meet-and-greets and spontaneous dance numbers, there is tension in the air at
Disney parks, especially while waiting in those tedious queues that can last for literally hours. For one mom, she hit a boiling point with another mom, leading to a bigger question: how far is too far when interfering with another parent‚Äôs kid‚Äôs behavior?
TikTok mom,
Rachel The Dreamer, posted a video on her account, asking her followers what they would have done in her situation involving another person‚Äôs child who was allegedly acting up at Hollywood Studios in Disney World.
‚ÄúThe week after Christmas, I took my kids to Disney World. Saved up a long time for this trip. My kids are getting old. I wanted to have this memory while I still could,‚Äù she began.
‚ÄúWell, we go to the Star Wars ride, which everybody has to wait a million hours to go, and there's this little demon child there. And yes, I mean that with sincerity, he was a menace.‚Äù
As Rachel waited in the long line amongst said ‚Äúdemon child,‚Äù she noticed that his parents had given him a toy lightsaber.
‚ÄúWhich I get, when my kids were young, they loved that crap. But [his parents] were not paying any attention, and this kid's probably like seven, eight years old, and he kept hitting people. He was swinging it wide. Little man did not give a flip,‚Äù she recalled.
She wasn‚Äôt super bothered by the kid‚Äôs out-of-pocket behavior until he began to swing and hit her kids and herself. That‚Äôs when she stepped in and spoke to the child.
She continued, ‚ÄúAnd I was like, ‚ÄòAll right, time to put it away, kiddo.‚Äô Yeah, I got on this other person's kid, and the mom freaked out.‚Äù
‚ÄúAnd the mom goes, ‚ÄòHe is fine. We are good. He can do what he wants. He's not bothering anyone.‚Äô I'm like, ‚ÄòLady, please. Your kid hit me and my kid. Get him under control.‚Äô And she's like, ‚ÄòWe're fine.‚Äô‚Äù
Things escalated from there with the mother of the lightsaber kid raising her voice and yelling at Rachel who started to dismiss the situation with a handwave. Soon enough, Disney security arrived on the scene to separate the two families.
‚ÄúJust parent your kids, y'all. Just parent them,‚Äù Rachel begged.
Several TikTok users sided with Rachel, noting that she did the right thing by addressing the seemingly out-of-control boy.
‚ÄúIf someone told my kid to stop I would be mortified because I wasn‚Äôt paying attention and I would be apologizing like forever,‚Äù one user wrote.
‚ÄúTook my kids to Disneyland. My 8yo saved up his money for a lightsaber and it stayed in the bag ALL DAY!,‚Äù another said.
‚ÄúIf you don‚Äôt want to parent your kid, don‚Äôt get mad when someone else does!ü§∑üèº‚ôÄÔ∏èI‚Äôd probably do the same,‚Äù another said.
‚ÄúYep if my kid was acting unacceptable I would want someone to help correct it,‚Äù the OP replied.
Another pointed out that this whole ‚Äúparents not looking after their kids‚Äù thing is all too common at Disney parks.
‚ÄúThis is so many kids at Disney. And the parents don‚Äôt care and are rarely paying attention. That‚Äôs why Disney has to run a constant recording of ‚ÄòParents please watch your children,‚Äô they wrote.
The response to Rachel‚Äôs video made one thing clear: if mom or dad aren‚Äôt going to take the time to parent their child, mind their manners, and make sure they‚Äôre not disturbing those around them, someone else is going to do it for them.

author: Ev Foley
title: GameChange Solar trackers and racking meet Australian standards
text:
USA-headquartered solar tracker and fixed-tilt racking technology company GameChange Solar has successfully completed a structural and electrical design compliance review for its Genius Tracker 1P and 1P-2R systems in Australia, conducted by assurance and risk management firm DNV.
The review shows that GameChange Solar‚Äôs design methodology for Genius 1P and 1P-2R solar trackers complies with the relevant structural and electrical standards in Australia.
The independent assessment also evaluated the compliance of Genius 1P and 1P-2R solar with Australian standards, in wind regions A and D.
GameChange Solar Oceania and Southeast Asia (SEA) Managing Director Vaibhav Joshi said the Genius 1P and 1P-2R trackers are designed for high performance and structural resilience, ensuring they can withstand Australia‚Äôs demanding environmental conditions.
‚ÄúThis DNV compliance review demonstrates that GameChange Solar provides reliable, bankable solar tracking solutions that meet the highest global standards,‚Äù Joshi said.
‚ÄúIt further strengthens our position as a trusted provider, giving developers and EPCs the confidence they need in our products.‚Äù
Key parameters were considered in the review including expected load paths, loads and load combinations, limit state design as required under AS/NZS 1170, structural capacity checks, and supporting engineering analysis and testing for structural integrity.
The electrical compliance review further validated that GameChange Solar‚Äôs Genius 1P tracker complies with AS/NZS 3000-2018 and other key relevant Australian standards, demonstrating adherence to critical safety and operational benchmarks for solar tracking systems.
This content is protected by copyright and may not be reused. If you want to cooperate with us and would like to reuse some of our content, please contact: editors@pv-magazine.com.

author: La Cerca \/ EP
title: UGT carga contra "la nueva vuelta de tuerca" a la carrera profesional de los profesionales del Sescam
text:
UGT carga contra ‚Äúla nueva vuelta de tuerca‚Äù a la carrera profesional de los profesionales del Sescam
El sindicato UGT ha cargado en un comunicado contra ‚Äúla nueva vuelta de tuerca‚Äù a la carrera profesional de los profesionales del Servicio de Salud de Castilla-La Mancha (Sescam).
De este modo, el sindicato ha informado de que este viernes se publica en el Diario Oficial de Castilla-La Mancha una Resoluci√≥n que ‚Äúsupone la paralizaci√≥n del efecto econ√≥mico de aquellas solicitudes de Homologaci√≥n de Carrera Profesional cuyo reconocimiento sea posterior a la entrada en vigor de la Ley 1/2012‚Äù.
Para UGT esto supone una ‚Äúvuelta de tuerca‚Äù a los profesionales del Sescam, ‚Äúno solo a los que ya estaban, que no pueden pedir nuevos grados de Carrera Profesional al estar este sistema paralizado por Ley‚Äù, sino que ‚Äúahora se a√±ade a los nuevos profesionales que se incorporaran al Servicio de Salud a partir del martes 17 de septiembre en el Concurso de Traslados, y que traen nuevos grados de Carrera Profesional reconocidos por sus Servicios de Salud de origen‚Äù.
‚ÄúEstos no tendr√°n efecto econ√≥mico si fueron reconocidos con posterioridad a 1 de marzo de 2012. De esta forma ni los que est√°n, ni los que ahora vienen tendr√°n derecho a nuevos grados de Carrera Profesional. Cuesti√≥n que ser√° abordada, sin duda, judicialmente‚Äù.
La propia Resoluci√≥n hoy publicada, seg√∫n explica UGT, establece que ‚Äúla carrera profesional supone el derecho de los profesionales a progresar, de forma individualizada, como reconocimiento a su desarrollo profesional en cuanto a conocimientos, experiencia y cumplimiento de los objetivos de la organizaci√≥n a la cual prestan sus servicios‚Äù. ‚ÄúEn Castilla la Mancha los profesionales carecen de ese Derecho desde 2012. Se predica la igualdad entre las comunidades aut√≥nomas en materia de financiaci√≥n, pero Castilla-La Mancha es la √∫nica en no reanudar los reconocimientos de Carrera Profesional dentro de sus fronteras‚Äù.
Para UGT, ‚Äúno solo hay que predicar, tambi√©n hay que dar trigo‚Äù.
‚ÄúLos profesionales del Sescam merecen la inmediata puesta en marcha de su sistema de Carrera Profesional y esto conseguir√≠a con la Derogaci√≥n de la Ley 1/2012, por lo que insta a que no se dilaten m√°s en el tiempo el reconocimiento de nuevos grados para todos los profesionales del Servicio de Salud, es por tanto una cuesti√≥n de voluntad pol√≠tica‚Äù.
En materia de contrataci√≥n, UGT asegura que no est√° de acuerdo con las actuales limitaciones, que hace que todo contrato deba ser autorizado por la Consejer√≠a de Hacienda de Castilla-La Mancha, ‚Äúno siendo as√≠ en muchos casos‚Äù. ‚ÄúSe est√°n denegando contratos, sustituciones y permisos por conciliaci√≥n de la vida laboral y familiar‚Äù.

author: advfn.com
title: AINN Layer2 Mainnet Launch: TVL Surpasses $600 Million on Day One
text:
AINN Layer2 Mainnet Launch: TVL Surpasses $600 Million on Day One
 AINN Layer2, as the first Bitcoin Layer2 network focusing on Web3 + AI applications, has seen its total value locked (TVL) in assets staked surpass $600 million on its mainnet launch day, making it the Layer2 network with the largest TVL within 24 hours.
AINN Layer2 enables users to stake BRC-20 inscription assets like $BTC, $AINN, $ORDI, $SATS, and $RATS, among others, on the mainnet, with plans to support more types of assets for staking in the future. Staking specified assets on the AINN Layer2 mainnet earns users TVL staking points, which can be exchanged for future $ANVM token airdrops.
AINN Layer2 has secured investments from prominent market maker Amber Group and Waterdrip Capital, as well as Bitmart‚Äôs Cipholio Ventures, Satoshi Lab, AscendEx, Foundinals Lab, Monday Capital, Bitrise Capital, and others, including several key opinion leaders in the Bitcoin ecosystem and partners in institutional finance.
On April 5, 2024, AINN Layer2 officially signed a Memorandum of Understanding with the Ministry of Digital Development of the Kyrgyz Republic, marking a new chapter in the collaboration between both parties in digitalization and governance within the Web3 sphere.
Following its mainnet‚Äôs launch, AINN Layer2 is set to roll out the ‚ÄòAI Odyssey‚Äô, a unique event that stands out from traditional finance odyssey, allowing users to interact with various Web3 + AI applications, such as AI-generated texts, images, and videos.
AINN Layer2 is actively engaging with the community, marked by its recent participation in notable events like Hong Kong Web 3.0 Spring Summit, BTC L2 Summit, and Token2049 in Dubai.
AINN Layer2 focused on improving the fundamental elements of decentralized AI, creating a supportive environment for the growth of AI-based applications. Thousands of AI applications are planned to be deployed on AINN Layer2 going forward, and with billions of users expected to utilize these applications, both parties are shaping a promising future for the Web3 + AI ecosystem.
For More Details on AINN Layer2 Mainnet:

author: Movieguide¬Æ
title: Kel Mitchell Encourages ‚ÄòOpen-Ended Conversation‚Äô With God
text: Kel Mitchell Encourages ‚ÄòOpen-Ended Conversation‚Äô With God By Movieguide¬Æ Contributor Actor, producer and comedian Kel Mitchell is reflecting on the importance of prayer. ‚ÄúThis is what I want to tell you,‚Äù Mitchell [began](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JXq7YiH-bP0) a recent sermon. ‚ÄúGod wants to be included in every activity, every conversation, every problem, and even every thought that you have. I want y‚Äôall to know that you can carry on a continuous, open-ended conversation with God throughout the day. Talking with him about whatever is going on in your life.‚Äù ‚ÄúHear Him out and talk to Him and find instruction,‚Äù he [continued](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JXq7YiH-bP0). ‚ÄúYou need to do that every day because although life be lifing‚Äîy‚Äôall know what that means, life be lifing‚Äîyou got to also understand that God be guiding too. Life be lifing, but God be guiding, meaning what God promised you will happen, but are you bold enough to step into the light?‚Äù Mitchell found fame through ‚Äô90s Nickelodeon shows like ALL THAT and KENAN & KEL. While he still acts‚Äîmost recently appearing in 2023‚Äôs GOOD BURGER 2‚Äîhe became a licensed pastor in 2019. ‚ÄúI‚Äôve always known God,‚Äù he [told](https://www.foxnews.com/entertainment/nickelodeon-star-kel-mitchell-explains-why-became-youth-pastor-ive-always-known-god) Fox News Digital. ‚ÄúGrew up in a church, but there‚Äôs a difference between knowing God and having a relationship with God. And I just got to a point in my life where I wanted to make sure that He was in everything that I do.‚Äù Mitchell often shares his faith and encourages followers through his [social media platform](https://www.instagram.com/p/C42A3sGu1m6/). Several weeks ago, he posted a prayer urging his fans to invite Christ into every area of their lives. It [read](https://www.instagram.com/p/C2XqErCJhh5/): ‚ÄúI realize the supernatural realm is where victories are won. So I declare the victory in Jesus‚Äôs name. I declare victory over every Goliath in my life-in my family, my finances, my workplace, my church/ministry, and my body. I decree and declare that today is the dawning of a new season of success and fruitfulness. Old things have passed away; behold, all things are becoming new. In Jesus‚Äôs name, amen.‚Äù ‚ÄúNot everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced,‚Äù he [quoted](https://www.instagram.com/p/C2XqErCJhh5/?img_index=3), adding, ‚ÄúEveryone you meet is fighting a battle you know nothing about. Be kind. Always.‚Äù Movieguide¬Æ previously [reported](https://www.movieguide.org/news-articles/kel-mitchell-its-a-beautiful-feeling-to-be-in-harmony-with-god.html): Actor and pastor Kel Mitchell emphasizes the importance of accepting God‚Äôs messages and staying ‚Äúin harmony‚Äù with one‚Äôs faith. ‚ÄúWhen you receive a heartfelt letter, there is excitement. We want to have that same excitement to know that God loves us, so when He sends a message to us, we have to be willing to receive it,‚Äù Mitchell [said]in a recent sermon. ‚ÄúThe words of the Bible are like personal texts into your spiritual inbox.‚Äù He explained that not only do you need to be excited to receive these messages, you need to be ready and willing for whatever God is calling you to do. ‚ÄúChallenging us to be different ‚Äî that is what God is saying. Challenging us to be different, encouraging us to transform our thinking and live according to a higher purpose. His purpose,‚Äù Mitchell said. Now more than ever we‚Äôre bombarded by darkness in media, movies, and TV. Movieguide¬Æ has fought back for almost 40 years, working within Hollywood to propel uplifting and positive content. We‚Äôre proud to say we‚Äôve collaborated with some of the top industry players to influence and redeem entertainment for Jesus. Still, the most influential person in Hollywood is you. The viewer. What you listen to, watch, and read has power. Movieguide¬Æ wants to give you the resources to empower the good and the beautiful. But we can‚Äôt do it alone. We need your support. You can make a difference with as little as $7. It takes only a moment. If you can, consider supporting our ministry with a monthly gift. Thank you. author: Diwakar Sharma
title: Maharashtra: She lay unseen under fallen tree for 48 hours
text: A man, desperately searching for his mother who had been missing for 48 hours, reviewed multiple CCTV recordings and identified a likely location. He broke into tears upon recognising his mothers saree under a large tamarind tree that had fallen on Wednesday morning. Her body, highly decomposed, was recovered 48 hours later. The victim, identified as Manjula Jha, was in her late 60s. Her son has blamed authorities for doing nothing to recover the body. Despite her sons missing person report filed at Arnala police station on June 19, the body of the senior citizen remained trapped under the uprooted tamarind tree for over 48 hours. mid-day reached out to VVCMC several times but there was no response. The victim Manjula JhaAfter the agencies, including civic as well as police officials, were informed, they all rushed to the spot and her highly decomposed, jewellery-laden body was recovered. The body was sent to a nearby rural hospital in Virar, where her post-mortem was conducted. mid-day visited her residence at Bolinj Naka in Virar, where the family members were crying inconsolably over the irreparable loss. Jha had shifted to Virar hardly a week ago, along with her two sons and their families. Previously, they lived in Kashimira for more than two decades, said a neighbour. Had I been known of the life threat in Virar, I would have never shifted, sobbed her younger son Naresh Jha, who works in the film industry. The incident Manjula had gone to drop her grandchildren to the school bus on Wednesday morning. She stopped under a tamarind tree to pluck flowers for worship. The strong wind, followed by rain, caused the tree to fall, said a woman who was present at the spot. Police authorities during the search operation to find the victim. Pics/Hanif Patel After the initial search operation, her son Suresh Jha registered a missing persons complaint at Arnala police station. We had been searching for her but she was not found anywhere, said Vijay Patil, senior inspector of Arnala police station. On Thursday, Manjulas sons had started to scan CCTV cameras in the vicinity. My mother was seen on the CCTV footage returning. After reaching the tamarind tree, she was not visible, so I suspected she might have gotten trapped under the branches, said Naresh. The elder son Suresh Jha said, My mother was our pillar of strength. My father passed away nearly 20 years ago. She would go for a jog in the morning and return home by 7.30 am. But on June 19, when she did not come back we got alarmed. Initially, we didnt anticipate any mishap so I went to work. However, when I heard that she hadnt returned home even by the afternoon, I rushed back. We even made an announcement at the railway station in case she was there, as she had planned to go to Kashimira to meet our old neighbours, said Suresh. The body was so badly decomposed that her eyes were out of the socket. It had started to emanate a foul smell. Who is responsible for that? Foul smell was from human Local residents told mid-day that the body was highly decomposed. The relatives of an elderly woman (Manjula) came to this place in the morning (Friday) and began a search operation. Suddenly, I heard that one woman was trapped under the tree. She was not visible due to the branches and the garbage that was thrown in the area, said a local resident. Funeral pyre of the victim, Manjula Jha When asked if anyone noticed a foul smell in the surroundings as the body was lying unattended when it rained intermittently amidst intolerable humidity, a woman said, Rodents often die in the area and we are used to such smell, not realising it was a human being this time said a woman. The Arnala police have registered an accidental death report (ADR) in connection with the matter. mid-day tried to reach out to VVCMC commissioner Anil Pawar, but he did not respond to the calls and messages.
